description.value: This code system defines a set of codes for Insurance Product Type.

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

definition.value: Health insurance provided through a Preferred Provider Organization (PPO).
Health insurance provided through a High Deductible Health Plan (HDHP).
Health insurance provided through a Point-of-Service (POS) Plan.
Health insurance provided through a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO).
Health insurance provided through a Exclusive Provider Organization(EPO)
Health insurance provided to eligible adults and children under the Federal Medicaid program
Health insurance provided to eligible adults and children under the Federal Medicaid program through a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO).
Health insurance provided by a private company that contracts with Medicare to provide all Medicare Part A and Part B benefits.
Health insurance offered by a private company that contracts with Medicare to provide all Medicare Part A and Part B benefits through a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO).
Health insurance provided under the Federal Medicare program covering inpatient hospital stays, care in a skilled nursing facility, hospice care, and some home health care.
Health insurance provided under the Federal Medicfare program covering certain doctors' services, outpatient care, medical supplies, and preventive services.
Health insurance provided under the Federal Medicare program covering prescription drugs.

Health insurance provided under the Federal Medicare program covering inpatient hospital stays, care in a skilled nursing facility, hospice care, some home health care, certain doctors' services, outpatient care, medical supplies, and preventive services.

Health insurance provided through and certified by the Health Insurance Marketplace that provides essential health benefits (EHBs), follows established limits on cost sharing, and meets other requirements outlined within the application process.
Health care program provided to United States American Indians and Alaska Natives.
Health insurance provided to employees of the Federal government.
Health care program provided to uniformed service members, retirees, and their families around the world.
Health care program provided to eligible veterans.
Health insurance provided to cover services related to the study, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the oral cavity.

Health insurance provided to cover services related to the study, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the oral cavity provided through a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO).
Health insurance provided to cover services related to the study, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the eyes.

Health insurance provided to cover services related to the study, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the eyes provided through a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO).
